pages.text: Furca is a marrellomorph from the Late Ordovician period. It possessed a broad head shield with 3 pairs of spines along its body with smaller spines lining the entire head shield.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
